ShortStack is a digital marketing platform built for engagement, lead collection and marketing automation. Create unique landing pages, run social contests, choose winners, send emails and analyze results - all from one place. 
 
From instant win and hashtag contests to personality quizzes and simple sweepstakes, use our professionally designed templates to build mobile-responsive landing pages in minutes. Templates are easy to customize to complement your brand -- no coding or technical expertise required. 
 
Whether you’re a business whose projects require team collaboration or an agency that manages multiple brands, you can use ShortStack to build tailored and shareable online marketing campaigns. Features like tagging, and the ability to assign different levels of access to individual campaign assets, help your whole team work efficiently.
 
ShortStack also offers custom design services. Our experienced developers and designers have built creative campaigns for clients and agencies in every industry, from hospitality and sports/entertainment to technology and retail. 

With ShortStack you can: 
• Run unlimited contests and online marketing campaigns
• Collect leads and choose winners
• Embed your campaigns on your website and publish standalone landing pages
• Use email marketing features to send automated, scheduled and follow-up emails 
• Integrate directly with MailChimp or connect to another email or CRM service with our webhook option
• Review comprehensive real-time analytics to see who is viewing your landing pages, where they’re located and what kind of device they’re on
• Receive 365-days-a-year customer support
